commits.message:
Mention assume-system-creds when creds are absent

If one happens to run euare-accountcreate during installation without
first fetching credentials with clcadmin-assume-system-credentials one
can wind up with the generic "missing access key ID" error message.  In
that specific case we provide a little more guidance by explicitly
mentioning that command's existence when the happens.

Fixes TOOLS-589
